long_description: Built with a steel frame, snappy Shimano 105 components and a smooth carbon fork, the GT Corsa Disc Bike is designed to be ridden far and hard. Double-butted chromoly steel frame supplies a buttery-smooth ride quality while remaining stiff and responsive. All-carbon fork with tapered carbon steerer supplies vibration-damping performance to increase ride quality. Lightweight Shimano 105 derailleurs and shifters offer precise, dependable shifts throughout the 20 gear combinations. Compact FSA Gossamer 53/39 crankset is paired with a 12-30 cassette to offer a wide range of gears for any gradient. Frame eyelets make it easy to attach fenders or a rear rack (not included) for enhanced utility. Hayes CX-5 mechanical disc brakes offer powerful braking even in wet weather. Continental Cross Speed tires roll smoothly and grip well in corners for good all-around performance. Specs on the GT Corsa Disc Bike are subject to change; pedals sold separately.
